task.title: How to find locators by Class Name
task.shortdesc: Locators can be found with many possible ways. One of them is by class name which is the most reliable one after id.

prereq.p: Read how to create local variables

taskbody.context: You will find out how to find locators by class name :

step.cmd: Go to the dom in the web site and search for the class name of the given web element
Use lambda => after the locator's name or =
Use the command driver.FindBy(By.className()) after the lambda
Put the class into the by.className brackets

result.p: You will be able to perform action on the locator
